name: Rope (VelocidadX)
description:
Rope

A game by VelocidadX

You are  joined together with your friend, you both have to work together to solve puzzles and complete levels!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam, fitting the theme joined together.

Join our discord!And share feedback, and let us know how far you can go!

Thanks to our awesome team for making this game possible!

Marco S. Hampel:  Programmer of rope physics, game UI, player animation, level design,

Keniak1G9: Programmer of players movement, key and door scripts, logo creator and level designer.

Richard: Programmed the menu and volume settings and other things

Valtriptor: Made the Banner, page of the game.

A bug fix was made before 2:50 however it failed to upload due to internet problems. This is the link to a fixed version which fixes the bug that prevents level 5 from loading:https://velocidadx-official.itch.io/rope-fixed
